name: s63_funniest-comments-overheard-during-lectures
description: The "Funniest Comments Overheard During Lectures" project is a lighthearted platform where students can share and explore hilarious or out-of-context remarks heard during classes. With features like uploads, voting, and leaderboards, this project celebrates the quirks of campus life while showcasing your technical skills in building interactive, user-driven platforms.
